Package invoice

Class InvoiceLayer

java.lang.Object
utils.database.BaseLayer
invoice.InvoiceLayer
public class InvoiceLayer extends BaseLayer
The InvoiceLayer class provides access to invoice data stored in a JSON format, retrieved from a database table. It extends the BaseLayer class for database connection management.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class utils.database.BaseLayer

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static InvoiceLayer getInstance()
      Get the singleton instance of the InvoiceLayer class.
      Returns:
      The instance of the InvoiceLayer.

    • getInvoiceList

      public List<Invoice> getInvoiceList()
      Get a list of all invoices stored in the JSON data.
      Returns:
      A list of Invoice objects representing the invoices.

    • getInvoiceById

      public Invoice getInvoiceById(Integer id)
      Get an invoice by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the invoice to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Invoice object representing the invoice with the given ID, or null if no invoice with the provided ID is found.

    • getInvoiceByCustomerId

      public List<Invoice> getInvoiceByCustomerId(Integer customerId)
      Get a list of invoices for a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer for whom to retrieve invoices.
      Returns:
      A list of Invoice objects associated with the provided customer ID.

    • createInvoice

      public int createInvoice(Transaction transaction)
      Create a new invoice for a given transaction.
      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction for which to create an invoice.
      Returns:
      The generated ID of the created invoice, or -1 if the creation fails.
